title: Pixel 4 Assistant Voice never completes even though it says "Sounds Great"
content: I complete the voice setup on Pixel 4 Assistant but the software never totally completes.  I get the "Sounds Great" screen with the big blue check mark, but when I try to use voice commands, it wants me to do the setup again.  Software = Android 10.  What do I need to do to get out of this loop?
